report.name: reshist1_isac

dataSource.name: Q_ANNEE_TRAITEE
dataSource.select: -- P_PARAM6 : Mois de traitement au format 'MM/AAAA' -- (Si année est vide, prendre Année dans datdebex!!!) SELECT DECODE( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), NULL, TO_CHAR(datdebex, 'YYYY'), SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4) ) dc_annee_traitee FROM datdebex

dataSource.name: Q_NBJOUR_OUVRE
dataSource.select: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- -- Chargement sous SQL/PLUSS : @G:\Honore\Dvlp\QueryReport\NbjOuvre.sql; -- Query secondaire Etat $RESHIST -- Dans le cadre de $RESHIST: Détermination du nombre de jours ouvrés -- de chacun des mois de l'année traitée -- -- RAPPEL : PARAMETRES DU REPORT $RESHIST : -- P_PARAM6 : Mois de traitement 'MM/AAAA' (Si année est vide, prendre Année dans datdebex!!!) -- P_PARAM7 : Code DPG (CHAR(6) ) -- P_PARAM8 : Code de la ressource NUMBER(5) dans la base Oracle -- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SELECT pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '01') dc_nbjour_ouvre_01, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '02') dc_nbjour_ouvre_02, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '03') dc_nbjour_ouvre_03, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '04') dc_nbjour_ouvre_04, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '05') dc_nbjour_ouvre_05, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '06') dc_nbjour_ouvre_06, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '07') dc_nbjour_ouvre_07, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '08') dc_nbjour_ouvre_08, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '09') dc_nbjour_ouvre_09, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '10') dc_nbjour_ouvre_10, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '11') dc_nbjour_ouvre_11, pack_verif_reshist.f_nbjour_ouvre( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), '12') dc_nbjour_ouvre_12 FROM dual

dataSource.name: Q_RESHIST
dataSource.select: SELECT pro.divsecgrou dc_coddpg, pro.cpident dc_cpident, res.rnom dc_cpnom, pro.tires dc_tires, pro.pid dc_codproj, NVL(pro.aist, ' ') dc_soustache, MAX(pro.rnom) dc_nomres, MAX(decode(pro.aistty,'FF',pro.factpno,pro.pnom)) dc_nomproj, MAX(str.sigdep) dc_sigdep, MAX(str.sigpole) dc_sigpole, MAX(str.libdsg) dc_libdsg, --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Consommations de la ressource par mois --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- DECODE( LEAST( '01', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '01', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp('01', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou,pro.cpident, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)), 0) dc_conso_01, DECODE( LEAST( '02', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '02', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp('02', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou,pro.cpident, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)), 0) dc_conso_02, DECODE( LEAST( '03', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '03', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp('03', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou,pro.cpident,pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)), 0) dc_conso_03, DECODE( LEAST( '04', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '04', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp('04', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou,pro.cpident, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)), 0) dc_conso_04, DECODE( LEAST( '05', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '05', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp('05', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.cpident,pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)), 0) dc_conso_05, DECODE( LEAST( '06', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '06', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp('06', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou, pro.cpident,pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)), 0) dc_conso_06, DECODE( LEAST( '07', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '07', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp('07', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou,pro.cpident, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)), 0) dc_conso_07, DECODE( LEAST( '08', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '08', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp('08', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou,pro.cpident, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)), 0) dc_conso_08, DECODE( LEAST( '09', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '09', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp('09', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou,pro.cpident, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)), 0) dc_conso_09, DECODE( LEAST( '10', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '10', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp('10', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou,pro.cpident, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)), 0) dc_conso_10, DECODE( LEAST( '11', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '11', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp('11', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou,pro.cpident, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)), 0) dc_conso_11, DECODE( LEAST( '12', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '12', pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp('12', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.divsecgrou,pro.cpident, pro.tires, pro.pid, MAX(pro.aist)), 0) dc_conso_12 FROM proplus pro, ressource res, struct_info str WHERE -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Jointure avec struct_info pour avoir les libellés DPG -------------------------------------------------------------- pro.divsecgrou = str.codsg and ( str.topfer = 'O' OR str.topfer = 'N' ) and pro.cpident=res.ident -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restriction suivant Parametres du report -------------------------------------------------------------- &P_WHERE GROUP BY pro.divsecgrou, pro.cpident , res.rnom, pro.tires, pro.pid, NVL(pro.aist, ' ') ORDER BY MAX(str.sigdep), MAX(str.sigpole), pro.divsecgrou, MAX(pro.rnom), pro.tires, pro.pid, NVL(pro.aist, ' ')

dataDescriptor.expression: DECODE ( LEAST ( '01' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '01' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp ( '01' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.cpident , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '02' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '02' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp ( '02' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.cpident , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '03' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '03' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp ( '03' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.cpident , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '04' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '04' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp ( '04' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.cpident , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '05' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '05' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp ( '05' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.cpident , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '06' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '06' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp ( '06' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.cpident , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '07' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '07' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp ( '07' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.cpident , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '08' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '08' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp ( '08' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.cpident , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '09' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '09' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp ( '09' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.cpident , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '10' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '10' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp ( '10' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.cpident , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '11' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '11' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp ( '11' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.cpident , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '12' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '12' , pack_verif_reshist.f_conso_ress_cp ( '12' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.divsecgrou , pro.cpident , pro.tires , pro.pid , MAX ( pro.aist ) ) , 0 )

function.name: afterpform
cf_tot_sous_tacheformula
function.textSource: function CF_TOT_SOUS_TACHEFormula return Number is l_res NUMBER(15, 2) := 0; begin l_res := :dc_conso_01 + :dc_conso_02 + :dc_conso_03 + :dc_conso_04 + :dc_conso_05 + :dc_conso_06 + :dc_conso_07 + :dc_conso_08 + :dc_conso_09 + :dc_conso_10 + :dc_conso_11 + :dc_conso_12 ; return(l_res); end;

function.name: cf_sum_tot_ress_consoformula
function.textSource: function CF_SUM_TOT_RESS_CONSOFormula return Number is l_res NUMBER(15, 2) := 0; begin l_res := :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_01 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_02 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_03 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_04 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_05 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_06 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_07 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_08 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_09 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_10 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_11 + :CS_TOT_RESS_CONSO_12; return(l_res); end;

function.name: m_sous_tacheformattrigger
function.textSource: function M_SOUS_TACHEFormatTrigger return boolean is begin IF ( (:dc_conso_01 = 0) AND (:dc_conso_02 = 0) AND (:dc_conso_03 = 0) AND (:dc_conso_04 = 0) AND (:dc_conso_05 = 0) AND (:dc_conso_06 = 0) AND (:dc_conso_07 = 0) AND (:dc_conso_08 = 0) AND (:dc_conso_09 = 0) AND (:dc_conso_10 = 0) AND (:dc_conso_11 = 0) AND (:dc_conso_12 = 0) ) THEN RETURN(FALSE); ELSE return (TRUE); END IF; end;
